charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1101_01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking around
town and got caught up in some trouble...
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_02:
Hey, you just bumped into me! Who do you think
you are?
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_03:
We were just minding our own business!
What’re you getting in our way for?
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_0401_05:
Huh? What’s with that response? You think
you’re smart?
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_0402_07:
You think this will just go away if you say you’re
sorry? Real clever, kid.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_08:
Battle us! We’ll send you home in tears, so you
better get ready!
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_10:
Thought that if you picked a two-on-one fight,
you’d have an easy time winning? That’s
just pathetic.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_11: Doesn’t look like you could take [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] on anyway.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_12: What’s your deal?! We’ll beat you, too!
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_13: Hold on. That mark, that distinct hairstyle...
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_14: Oh! Are you Plumeria? The Team Skull Admin?
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_15: Wait, seriously? That’s who this is?
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_16: That’s right. So let’s end this nonsense.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_17: Get lost before things get painful for you.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_18: What? You look like you’ve got something to say.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_19:
A-actually, we’ve always looked up to you!
We’ve always wanted to meet you!
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1101_20:
Surprisingly, Plumeria quietly listened to what the
two had to say.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_21: We’re so sorry, Big Sis Plumeria!
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_22: All right, all right. It’s fine or whatever.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_23:
By the way, employees of that Pokémon Center
need help lugging in supplies.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_24:
Since you’ve obviously got some free time, go
help them out.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_0401_28:
Guess I could’ve stayed quiet and seen how you
handle yourself in a fight, but oh well.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_0401_29:
Not like there’d be a point to watching a battle
I already know the outcome of, though.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_0302_30: Thanks for helping me out, Big Sis!
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_0402_31:
Wh-what? Don’t tell me you’re going to start
calling me that, too?
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_0402_32:
The Grunts in Team Skull treat me like their big
sister. I’m just not used to hearing it from you.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_33:
Numskulls like that have too much energy and
don’t know what to do with it.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_34:
That’s why it’s good to give them a way to
get that energy out. Doesn’t have to be a
battle, either.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_35:
I just happened to remember that I heard the
Pokémon Center staff needed help moving
some stock.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_36:
Seems like a perfect fit for those two, don’t you
think? They might even earn a little cash for their
work, too.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_0301_37: Why go that far for them?
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_0401_38:
Who knows... Though they do remind of the guys
in Team Skull.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_0302_39: Do you like taking care of people?
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_0402_40:
Who knows... Though they do remind of the guys
in Team Skull.
charaepi_ch0121_00_plumeria/2301_1301_41: Just a bunch of dummies in their dumbness.
